Scripts.OnClick: SyncUI_DropDownMenu_Toggle(self.Menu, nil, "TOPLEFT", self, "BOTTOMLEFT", 0, 14)

Scripts.OnLeave: if not self:GetParent():IsMouseOver() then self:SetAlpha(0) end
if not self:GetParent():IsMouseOver() then self:SetAlpha(0) end

Scripts.OnClick:
if not self:IsShown() or SyncUI_OptionsMenu.SlideToLeft:IsPlaying() or SyncUI_OptionsMenu.SlideToRight:IsPlaying() then return end
SyncUI_OptionsMenu.BlizzMenu:Show() SyncUI_OptionsMenu.SyncMenu:Hide() SyncUI_OptionsMenu.SlideToRight:Play() SyncUI_OptionsMenu.SlideArrowRight:Show()
self:Hide()

if not self:IsShown() or SyncUI_OptionsMenu.SlideToLeft:IsPlaying() or SyncUI_OptionsMenu.SlideToRight:IsPlaying() then return end
SyncUI_OptionsMenu.BlizzMenu:Hide() SyncUI_OptionsMenu.SyncMenu:Show() SyncUI_OptionPanelFrame:Show() SyncUI_OptionPanelFrame_HidePanels()
SyncUI_OptionsMenu.SlideToLeft:Play() SyncUI_OptionsMenu.SlideArrowLeft:Show()
self:Hide()
HideUIPanel(GameMenuFrame) ShowUIPanel(VideoOptionsFrame) VideoOptionsFrame.lastFrame = GameMenuFrame
HideUIPanel(GameMenuFrame) InterfaceOptionsFrame:Show() InterfaceOptionsFrame.lastFrame = GameMenuFrame InterfaceOptionsFrameCancel:SetScript("OnClick",function() InterfaceOptionsFrame:Hide() end)
HideUIPanel(GameMenuFrame) KeyBindingFrame_LoadUI() KeyBindingFrame:Show()
HideUIPanel(GameMenuFrame) ShowMacroFrame()

local frame = ACP_AddonList or AddonList
ShowUIPanel(frame) HideUIPanel(GameMenuFrame)
if not IsResting() then HideUIPanel(GameMenuFrame) end GameMenuButtonLogout:Click();
if not IsResting() then HideUIPanel(GameMenuFrame) end GameMenuButtonQuit:Click();
ToggleHelpFrame()
ToggleStoreUI()
SyncUI_OptionPanelFrame_HidePanels() SyncUI_OptionPanel_Appearance:Show()
SyncUI_OptionPanelFrame_HidePanels() SyncUI_OptionPanel_Aura:Show()
SyncUI_OptionPanelFrame_HidePanels() SyncUI_OptionPanel_UnitFrames:Show()
SyncUI_OptionPanelFrame_HidePanels() SyncUI_OptionPanel_Quest:Show()
SyncUI_OptionPanelFrame_HidePanels() SyncUI_OptionPanel_Misc:Show()
SyncUI_OptionPanelFrame_HidePanels() SyncUI_OptionPanel_Broker:Show()
SyncUI_OptionPanelFrame_HidePanels() SyncUI_OptionPanel_Profiles:Show()
if UnitAffectingCombat("player") then UIErrorsFrame:AddMessage(ERR_NOT_IN_COMBAT,1,0,0) else HideUIPanel(GameMenuFrame) ShowUIPanel(SyncUI_PlacementTool) end

Scripts.OnHide: --self:EnableKeyboard(false) self:ClearAllPoints() self:SetPoint("CENTER",UIParent,0,75) self.SlideArrowRight:Show() self.SlideArrowLeft:Hide() self.BlizzMenu:Show() self.SyncMenu:Hide() SyncUI_OptionPanelFrame:Hide()

Scripts.OnClick: local profile = SyncUI_GetProfile() local parent = self:GetParent() if self:GetChecked() then profile.Options.Auras.DurationTimer = true parent.DurationColor:SetEnabled(true) parent.DurationSpiral:SetEnabled(true) else profile.Options.Auras.DurationTimer = false parent.DurationColor:SetEnabled(false) parent.DurationSpiral:SetEnabled(false) end
local profile = SyncUI_GetProfile() if self:GetChecked() then profile.Options.Auras.DurationColor = true else profile.Options.Auras.DurationColor = false end
local profile = SyncUI_GetProfile() if self:GetChecked() then profile.Options.Auras.DurationSpiral = true else profile.Options.Auras.DurationSpiral = false end
local profile = SyncUI_GetProfile() if self:GetChecked() then profile.Options.Auras.DebuffFilter = true else profile.Options.Auras.DebuffFilter = false end

if StaticPopup_Visible("SYNCUI_USEDEFAULTRAID") or StaticPopup_Visible("SYNCUI_NOTUSEDEFAULTRAID") then if self:GetChecked() then self:SetChecked(false) else self:SetChecked(true) end return end
if self:GetChecked() then StaticPopup_Hide("SYNCUI_NOTUSEDEFAULTRAID") StaticPopup_Show("SYNCUI_USEDEFAULTRAID") else StaticPopup_Hide("SYNCUI_USEDEFAULTRAID") StaticPopup_Show("SYNCUI_NOTUSEDEFAULTRAID") end

local profile = SyncUI_GetProfile() if self:GetChecked() then profile.Options.Quests.Accept = true
self:GetParent().Daily:SetEnabled(true) else profile.Options.Quests.Accept = false
self:GetParent().Daily:SetEnabled(false) end
local profile = SyncUI_GetProfile() if self:GetChecked() then profile.Options.Quests.Daily = true else profile.Options.Quests.Daily = false end
local profile = SyncUI_GetProfile() if self:GetChecked() then profile.Options.Quests.TurnIn = true else profile.Options.Quests.TurnIn = false end
local profile = SyncUI_GetProfile() if self:GetChecked() then profile.Options.Quests.Share = true else profile.Options.Quests.Share = false end

local profile = SyncUI_GetProfile() if self:GetChecked() then profile.Options.Quests.DisableTracker = true SyncUI_DisableFrame(ObjectiveTrackerFrame,true) else profile.Options.Quests.DisableTracker = false ObjectiveTrackerFrame:SetParent(SyncUI_ObjTracker) end
local profile = SyncUI_GetProfile() if self:GetChecked() then profile.Options.Misc.SkipCinematics = true else profile.Options.Misc.SkipCinematics = false end
local profile = SyncUI_GetProfile() if self:GetChecked() then profile.Options.Misc.DisableAFK = true else profile.Options.Misc.DisableAFK = false end
local profile = SyncUI_GetProfile() if self:GetChecked() then profile.Options.Misc.AutoSellJunk = true else profile.Options.Misc.AutoSellJunk = false end

local profile = SyncUI_GetProfile() local parent = self:GetParent() if self:GetChecked() then profile.Options.Misc.AutoRepair = true parent.UseGuildRepair:SetEnabled(true) else profile.Options.Misc.AutoRepair = false parent.UseGuildRepair:SetEnabled(false) end
local profile = SyncUI_GetProfile() if self:GetChecked() then profile.Options.Misc.UseGuildRepair = true else profile.Options.Misc.UseGuildRepair = false end

Scripts.OnTextChanged: if self:GetText() and self:GetText() ~= "" then self:GetParent().Create:Show() else self:GetParent().Create:Hide() end

Scripts.OnClick: SyncUI_CharData.Installed = true self.Despawn:Play()
ReloadUI()
